title: Hand drawn
content:
Hi Typeteam, d'you think this is hand drawn or an actual downloadable font? :)

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416001951im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pt_trl1_08_3903.jpg)
author: Rand

comments.content:
The two P's are different, and the baseline isn't level, which would indicate it's hand-drawn.

- Lex

Thanks Lex, you're possibly right, though I would add that the different 'P' could be attributed to the lowercase and I have designed fonts where the glyphs don't share a common baseline..  
Much appreciated!
